description: Type either the reading or the *eumhun* of the 900 Chinese characters taught in Korean middle schools.

deck.question: 乾
deck.comment: dry; first hexagram; warming principle of the sun, penetrating and fertilizing, heavenly generative principle (male)

deck.question: 界
deck.comment: boundary, limit; domain; society; the world

deck.question: 困
deck.comment: to surround, beseige; to be surrounded; difficult

deck.question: 共
deck.comment: together with, all, total; to share

deck.question: 久
deck.comment: long time (ago); time passage, grow late

deck.question: 弓
deck.comment: bow; curved, arched; KangXi radical number 57

deck.question: 及
deck.comment: extend; reach; come up to; and

deck.question: 己
deck.comment: self, oneself; personal, private; 6th heavenly stem

deck.question: 幾
deck.comment: how many? how much?; a few, some

deck.question: 期
deck.comment: period of time; date; time limit

deck.question: 起
deck.comment: rise, stand up; go up; begin

deck.question: 乃
deck.comment: then; really, indeed; as it turned out, after all; namely

deck.question: 能
deck.comment: to be able; can, permitted to; ability

deck.question: 丹
deck.comment: cinnabar (native HgS); vermilion (artificial HgS used as pigment)

deck.question: 代
deck.comment: replace, replacement (of person or generation); era, generation

deck.question: 都
deck.comment: metropolis, capital; all, the whole; elegant, refined

deck.question: 列
deck.comment: a line; to arrange in order, classify

deck.question: 陸
deck.comment: land, continental; army; an accounting form of U+516D 六 (six)

deck.question: 莫
deck.comment: do not, is not, can not; negative

deck.question: 望
deck.comment: to look at, look forward; to hope, expect

deck.question: 麥
deck.comment: wheat, barley, oats; KangXi radical number 199

deck.question: 命
deck.comment: life; destiny, fate, luck; an order, instruction

deck.question: 鳴
deck.comment: cry of bird or animal; make sound

deck.question: 無
deck.comment: negative, no, not; lack, have no

deck.question: 勿
deck.comment: must not, do not; without, never

deck.question: 朴
deck.comment: simple, unadorned; sincere; surname; a tree

deck.question: 方
deck.comment: a square, rectangle; a region; local

deck.question: 番
deck.comment: to take turns; a turn, a time; to repeat

deck.question: 法
deck.comment: law, rule, regulation, statute; France, French

deck.question: 浮
deck.comment: to float, drift, waft; to exceed; superfluous

deck.question: 分
deck.comment: divide; small unit of time etc.

deck.question: 佛
deck.comment: Buddha; of Buddhism; merciful person; Buddhist image; the dead (Jap.)

deck.question: 事
deck.comment: affair, matter, business; to serve; accident, incident

deck.question: 使
deck.comment: cause, send on a mission, order; envoy, messenger, ambassador

deck.question: 巳
deck.comment: the hours from 9 to 11; 6th terrestrial branch

deck.question: 殺
deck.comment: kill, slaughter, murder; hurt; to pare off, reduce, clip

deck.question: 上
deck.comment: top; superior, highest; go up, send up

deck.question: 色
deck.comment: color, tint, hue, shade; form, body; beauty, desire for beauty

deck.question: 舌
deck.comment: tongue; clapper of bell; KangXi radical 135

deck.question: 設
deck.comment: build; establish; display; particle of hypothesis, supposing

deck.question: 星
deck.comment: a star, planet; any point of light

deck.question: 送
deck.comment: see off, send off; dispatch, give

deck.question: 愁
deck.comment: anxiety; to worry about, be anxious

deck.question: 秀
deck.comment: ear of grain; flowering, luxuriant; refined, elegant, graceful

deck.question: 須
deck.comment: must, have to, necessary; moment; whiskers

deck.question: 首
deck.comment: head; first; leader, chief; a poem

deck.question: 宿
deck.comment: stop, rest, lodge, stay overnight; constellation

deck.question: 順
deck.comment: obey, submit to, go along with

deck.question: 拾
deck.comment: pick up, collect, tidy up; accounting form of the numeral ten

deck.question: 乘
deck.comment: ride, ascend; avail oneself of; numerary adjunct for vehicles

deck.question: 是
deck.comment: indeed, yes, right; to be; demonstrative pronoun, this, that

deck.question: 食
deck.comment: eat; meal; food; KangXi radical number 184

deck.question: 申
deck.comment: to state to a superior, report; extend; 9th terrestrial branch

deck.question: 我
deck.comment: our, us, i, me, my, we

deck.question: 仰
deck.comment: raise the head to look; look up to, rely on, admire

deck.question: 也
deck.comment: also; classical final particle of strong affirmation or identity

deck.question: 夜
deck.comment: night, dark; in night; by night

deck.question: 如
deck.comment: if, supposing; as if; like, as

deck.question: 與
deck.comment: and; with; to; for; give, grant

deck.question: 葉
deck.comment: leaf, petal; page of book; period

deck.question: 英
deck.comment: petal, flower, leaf; brave, a hero; England, English

deck.question: 于
deck.comment: in, on, at; go to; surname

deck.question: 位
deck.comment: throne; position, post; rank, status; seat

deck.question: 猶
deck.comment: like, similar to, just like, as

deck.question: 吟
deck.comment: sing, hum; recite; type of poetry

deck.question: 依
deck.comment: rely on, be set in; consent, obey a wish

deck.question: 以
deck.comment: by means of; thereby, therefore; consider as; in order to

deck.question: 而
deck.comment: and; and then; and yet; but

deck.question: 寅
deck.comment: to respect, reverence; respectfully; 3rd terrestrial branch

deck.question: 引
deck.comment: to pull, draw out, attract; to stretch

deck.question: 子
deck.comment: offspring, child; fruit, seed of; 1st terrestrial branch

deck.question: 者
deck.comment: that which; he who; those who

deck.question: 作
deck.comment: make; work; compose, write; act, perform

deck.question: 壯
deck.comment: big, large; robust; name of tribe

deck.question: 在
deck.comment: be at, in, on; consist in, rest

deck.question: 栽
deck.comment: to cultivate, plant; to care for plants

deck.question: 低
deck.comment: low; to lower, hang, bend, bow

deck.question: 丁
deck.comment: male adult; robust, vigorous; 4th heavenly stem

deck.question: 頂
deck.comment: top, peak; carry on head; very

deck.question: 兆
deck.comment: omen; million; mega; also trillion. China = million; Japan and Taiwan = trillion

deck.question: 族
deck.comment: a family clan, ethnic group, tribe

deck.question: 住
deck.comment: reside, live at, dwell, lodge; stop

deck.question: 走
deck.comment: walk, go on foot; run; leave

deck.question: 中
deck.comment: central; center, middle; in the midst of; hit (target); attain

deck.question: 之
deck.comment: marks preceding phrase as modifier of following phrase; it, him her, them; go to

deck.question: 執
deck.comment: hold in hand; keep; carry out

deck.question: 且
deck.comment: moreover, also (post-subject); about to, will soon (pre-verb)

deck.question: 此
deck.comment: this, these; in this case, then

deck.question: 千
deck.comment: thousand; many, numerous; very; (Cant.) a cheater, swindler

deck.question: 出
deck.comment: go out, send out; stand; produce

deck.question: 就
deck.comment: just, simply; to come, go to; to approach, near

deck.question: 齒
deck.comment: teeth; gears, cogs; age; KangXi radical 211

deck.question: 土
deck.comment: soil, earth; items made of earth

deck.question: 匹
deck.comment: bolt of cloth; counter for horses

deck.question: 下
deck.comment: under, underneath, below; down; inferior; bring down

deck.question: 混
deck.comment: to mix, blend, mingle; to bumble along

deck.question: 歡
deck.comment: happy, pleased, glad; joy; to enjoy

deck.question: 會
deck.comment: to assemble, meet together; a meeting; an organization
